paper_abstract: We extend the former matrix rearrangement approach of the entangling power to the general cases, without requirement of same dimensions of the subsystems. The entangling power of a unitary operator is completely determined by its realignment and partial transposition. As applications. we calculate the entangling power for the using interaction and the isotropic Heisenberg interaction in the hybrid qudit d(1) x d(2) systems.
paper_title: Matrix rearrangement approach for the entangling power with hybrid qudit systems
